## Vector3.(constructor)

Creates a new Vector3 object from the given x, y, z (floats) coordinates.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(
    x?: number, 
    y?: number, 
    z?: number);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | <code>number</code> | defines the first coordinates (on X axis) |
|  y | <code>number</code> | defines the second coordinates (on Y axis) |
|  z | <code>number</code> | defines the third coordinates (on Z axis) |
